name: @compositor/logo
description: Logo and app icons for Compositor

scripts.png: npm run logo-png && npm run zero-png && npm run breakpoint-png && npm run grid-png
scripts.icns: npm run zero-icns && npm run breakpoint-icns
scripts.favicon: sharp -i dist/compositor.png -o ./ resize 32 32 && mv compositor.png dist/favicon.png
scripts.prepublish: npm run png && npm run icns && npm run favicon

author: Brent Jackson
